body_html: I've submitted an internal patch that will nullify the src for android_tensorflow_lib in the same way as android_tensorflow_lib_lite. I agree that an informative error message might be ideal, but I'm worried about erroneous failures in automated builds and tests (not everything we run TF through seems to respect manual and notap at this point). As a compromise I added a comment on the targets specifying the targets must be built for Android, and how to do so.

body: I've submitted an internal patch that will nullify the src for android_tensorflow_lib in the same way as android_tensorflow_lib_lite. I agree that an informative error message might be ideal, but I'm worried about erroneous failures in automated builds and tests (not everything we run TF through seems to respect manual and notap at this point). As a compromise I added a comment on the targets specifying the targets must be built for Android, and how to do so.
